mainContentHeaderText: Fill in the basic details to create a new bank bankAccount. You can add additional search strings later or right now. They can also be changed later
isSavingsAccount: Bank account is a savings bankAccount
sideContentHeaderText: These fields are optional and can be added later. They help identify the corresponding data columns in the input data, which are used to create new transactions

amountInBankAfterTransactionSearchString: Amount in bank after transaction Search Strings

error_bankAccountName: Please enter a name for the bank account
error_NoInterestRate: Please enter a interest rate for the savings account
error_generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again
error_alreadyInList: This string is already in the list!
